lead_paragraph: Fethullah Gulen, who lives in Pennsylvania, masterminded the failed coup. The United States must send him back to Turkey to face justice.

headline.main: The Coup Leader Must Be Held Accountable

snippet: Fethullah Gulen, who lives in Pennsylvania, masterminded the failed coup. The United States must send him back to Turkey to face justice....
abstract: Op-Ed article by Ibrahim Kalin, spokesman for Turkish Pres Recep Tayyip Erdogan, justifies government's actions in wake of failed coup; argues evidence points to Fethullah Gullen as leader of coup attempt and calls on United States to extradite him.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Coups D'Etat and Attempted Coups D'Etat
